amendment.description: Amendment allows the President to use the line-item veto authority established by the bill for items in FY 1995 appropriations bills if the President notifies the Congress of such rescissions not later than ten calendar days after the enactment of the Line-Item Veto Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to allow the President to use the new line-item veto authority established by the bill for items in FY 1995 appropriations bills if the President notifies the Congress of such rescissions not later than ten calendar days after the enactment of the Line-Item Veto Act. (Text of the amendment was printed as amendment No. 15 in the Congressional Record of February 1, 1995.).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Obey amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.
